NAME: 黑暗中的笑声
STORYLINE: Based on Vladimir Nabokov's novel, set in 1930's Berlin, Laughter In The Dark centres on a wealthy art dealer, who abandons his wife and child for a temptress who in turn takes him for everything he's got.

NAME: 牛兄牛弟
STORYLINE: 主要讲述了讲述了刘德华的两个“儿子”安逗和黑仔为保护家园，齐心协力共同对抗外来敌人的冒险、感人故事。
